casebody.data:
UNITED STATES FASTENER CO. v. MEYERS et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 5, 1907.) No. 179. Appeal from the Circuit *1023Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Donald Campbell, Odin Roberts, Roberts & Mitchell, and Messimer & Campbell, for appellant. Livingston Gifford and George Cook, for appellees.

Before WALLACE, LACOMBE, and COXE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (145 Fed. 536) affirmed, with costs,
